 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרַב‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==desert-plateau, steppe== (compare [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Intr. Is. 129</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲרָ֑ב בַּעֲרַב‎</span> (si vera lectio) [[Isa.21.13|Isa 21:13]] (twice in verse) ***in the steppe*** (of what we know as North Arabia); but in v<sup>b</sup> [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Lo|Lo]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Gu|Gu]]<sup>Kau</sup> and others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעֶרֶב‎</span> ***in the evening***. 

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרָב‎</span> **proper name, of a people collective** ==steppe-dwellers of North Arabia== ([[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>ZVölkerpsych. vii. 463 f.</sup>; extended later (so [[BDB#Herod|Herod]]<sup>ii. 11 etc</sup>.) to whole peninsula, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***the Arabs***, Bedúwy ***the people***, [[BDB#Doughty|Doughty]]<sup>Arab. Deserta, i. 224</sup>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערבן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אערב‎</span> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv. p. 123</sup>, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Aribu***</u></abbr>, ***Arubu***, ***Arabi***, people in North Arabia, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pa 295 f., 304 f.</sup> [[BDB#COT|COT]]<sup>[[Jer.25.24|Jer 25:24]]</sup>; also ***Urbi*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pa 305 f.</sup> of nomad 'Arab' tribes); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשֹּׁכְנִים בַּמִּדְבָּר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְכֵי ע‎</span> [[Jer.25.24|Jer 25:24]] (see I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵרֶב‎</span>), [[2Chr.9.14|2Chr 9:14]] + \|\| [[1Kgs.10.15|1Kgs 10:15]] (see ***id.***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> also [[Ezek.27.21|Ezek 27:21]] + [[Ezek.30.5|Ezek 30:5]] (see ***id.***); see especially [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>Arabia in Ency. Bib</sup>.
